alert.note: Alert for Inland Indian River; Inland Martin; Inland Northern Brevard; Inland St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued November 16 at 1:42PM EST until November 17 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall remains possible. * WHERE...A portion of east central Florida, including the following areas, Indian River, Martin, Saint Lucie, Brevard, and Coastal Volusia Counties. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. Storm drains and ditches may become clogged with debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Widespread rainfall of 2 to 4 inches with locally higher amounts of 6 inches or greater. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Inland Indian River; Inland Martin; Inland Northern Brevard; Inland St. Lucie
